hasAttributes.name: LinePaymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: allowLateCharges
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify if late charges are allowed.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: batchId
hasAttributes.description: System-generated ID for batch.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: claimCreationFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicates if claims should be created for customer raised disputes.

hasAttributes.name: customerid
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: Description of the payment.

hasAttributes.name: glCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAccountId
hasAttributes.description: General Ledger Account code of the GL-revenue-account. Can be including sub-account ID. It can contain many different levels to identify the account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: lineBusinessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match the BusinessUnitCode in the BusinessUnit table.

hasAttributes.name: lineCustomerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: lineDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: lineDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of payment line.

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineLastModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: lineLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Line item number of the payment.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: linePaymentLineAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementPaymentMechanism
hasAttributes.description: Payment mechanism.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDate
hasAttributes.description: The date settled.

hasAttributes.name: lineSettlementSettlementDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Description Settlement / Other Discount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSourceDocumentId
hasAttributes.description: The source document to which the line relates.

hasAttributes.name: lineSupplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier who provided the goods for sale. Must match the supplierId in supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBase
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the tax is calculated. This can be an amount or a quantity, e.g. litres.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBaseDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the tax base, e.g. litres for excises on alcoholic beverages.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Tax code for lookup in tables.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxDeclarationPeriod
hasAttributes.description: The identification of the period of the declaration/return in which the tax amount is reported to the revenue body.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxExemptionReason
hasAttributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxPercentage
hasAttributes.description: Tax percentage.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxType
hasAttributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxPointDate
hasAttributes.description: Tax point date where recorded or, if not recorded, then the invoice date.

hasAttributes.name: maxRefundAmount
hasAttributes.description: Maximum amount in functional currency for which refund can be issued.

hasAttributes.name: maxWriteOffAmount
hasAttributes.description: Maximum write-off amount.

hasAttributes.name: minRefundAmount
hasAttributes.description: Minimum amount in functional currency for which refund can be issued.

hasAttributes.name: minWriteOffAmount
hasAttributes.description: Minimum write-off amount.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: paymentAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: paymentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each payment received. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. customer and payment number) to uniquely identify each transaction.

hasAttributes.name: paymentMethod
hasAttributes.description: The code value or indicator of the method by which the transaction debit or credit amount was extinguished or apportioned to the debt by the supplier, e.g. check, wire transfer, cash, etc.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on an externally-generated transaction, e.g. check date or wire transfer date.

hasAttributes.name: paymentRefNo
hasAttributes.description: External reference number for each payment made, e.g. payment reference at bank or with the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the receiptDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: periodYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the receiptDate occurs.

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL, e.g. "Posted" or "Not Posted".

hasAttributes.name: receiptAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: receiptAmountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: receiptId
hasAttributes.description: External reference number for each payment received, e.g. payment reference at bank or with the customer.

hasAttributes.name: referenceDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on an externally-generated transaction, e.g. check date or wire transfer date.

hasAttributes.name: revenueClassification
hasAttributes.description: Revenue policy value that defers revenue on transactions of customers that match the classification, e.g. def rev for subscriptions.

hasAttributes.name: salesPostingRules
hasAttributes.description: The rules defined for sales posting, e.g. day end, batch, individual, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source: code for source from which the journal entry originated, e.g. sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, etc.

hasAttributes.name: standardRefund
hasAttributes.description: Stores the maximum number of days allowed for refund.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemId
hasAttributes.description: Unique number created by the system for the document.

hasAttributes.name: totalAdjustmentCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the adjustments on the payment schedules of all the debit items for the specific account, site, currency and date. Special adjustments, such as Adjustment Reversal are not included.

hasAttributes.name: totalAdjustmentValue
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the adjustment amounts on the payment schedules of all the debit items for the specific account, site, currency and date. Special adjustments, such as Adjustment Reversal, are not included because they are used for internal accounting purposes only.

hasAttributes.name: totalChargeBackCount
hasAttributes.description: Count of the payment schedules (instalments) of all chargebacks for the specific customer account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: totalChargeBackValue
hasAttributes.description: Value of all chargebacks for the specific customer account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: totalEarnedDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Sum of the earned discounts that were given on the closed payment schedules (instalments) of all invoices for the specific account, site, currency and date.

hasAttributes.name: transactionDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the payment was made or credit was applied.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: accountId
hasAttributes.description: accountId associated with customer company/customer books of accounts used to identify the entity. The entity's supplier number in the customer's records.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginning
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount (that is, the ending balance from the prior period) recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all are recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginningLocal
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount in the local country currency for multicurrency tracking.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginningReporting
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount in reporting currency used for statutory reporting.

hasAttributes.name: amountEnding
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all are recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: amountEndingLocal
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount in the local country currency for multicurrency tracking.

hasAttributes.name: amountEndingReporting
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount in reporting currency used for statutory reporting.

hasAttributes.name: amountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: amountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: balanceAsOfDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the provided balance.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: companyType
hasAttributes.description: Type of company of the customer, e.g. B2B, B2C, manufacturing, limited company or similar.

hasAttributes.name: customerAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is expected or to whom unused credits have been applied.

hasAttributes.name: customerCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The credit limit for this customer.

hasAttributes.name: customerGroup
hasAttributes.description: The name of the group to which this customer has been assigned by the entity.

hasAttributes.name: customerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: customerName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: customerType
hasAttributes.description: The type of customer.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the BalanceAsOfDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which BalanceAsOfDate occurs

hasAttributes.name: glCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: IBANNumber
hasAttributes.description: International Bank Account Number, ISO 13616.

hasAttributes.name: accountGroup
hasAttributes.description: Number range in which the customer account number is assigned which can be either user or system.

hasAttributes.name: addressAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address, choose from the predefined enumeration, e.g. StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress.

hasAttributes.name: addressBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical building address of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: addressCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city where the customer is located.

hasAttributes.name: addressCountry
hasAttributes.description: The country code where the customer is physically located. Recommend ISO 3166-1 Alpha 2 or ISO 3166-1 Alpha 3 format (XX or XXX).

hasAttributes.name: addressNumber
hasAttributes.description: The building or other number of the address of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: addressPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The postcode of the city where the customer is physically located.

hasAttributes.name: addressRegion
hasAttributes.description: The physical state or province where the customer is located. Recommend ISO 3166-2.

hasAttributes.name: addressStreetName
hasAttributes.description: The street where the customer is located.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Unambiguous identification of the account to which credit and debit entries are made.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the individual or company holding the bank account.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: The number allocated to the account by the individual's or company's own bank.

hasAttributes.name: companyType
hasAttributes.description: Type of company of the customer, e.g. B2B, B2C, manufacturing, limited company or similar.

hasAttributes.name: contactPersonPhoneNumber
hasAttributes.description: Contact person phone number for any communication with the customer.

hasAttributes.name: creditAnalyst
hasAttributes.description: The person or service employed to assess the credit rating of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: creditClassification
hasAttributes.description: The customer credit assessment as moderate/high/low.

hasAttributes.name: creditCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The currency in which the credit limit is offered to the customer.

hasAttributes.name: creditRating
hasAttributes.description: Evaluating the credit risk of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: creditReviewCycle
hasAttributes.description: Periodicity of assessing the customer credit risk in days.

hasAttributes.name: customerAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is expected or to whom unused credits have been applied.

hasAttributes.name: customerClassOrGroup
hasAttributes.description: Group or class to which customer belong, e.g. wholesaler, retailer, consumer, B2B, B2C.

hasAttributes.name: customerCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The credit limit for this customer's total outstanding balance.

hasAttributes.name: customerGroup
hasAttributes.description: If the organization segments customers into groups, the group to which this customer is assigned/belongs to.

hasAttributes.name: customerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer.

hasAttributes.name: customerType
hasAttributes.description: The type of customer.

hasAttributes.name: customerZone
hasAttributes.description: Area or geographical location to which the customer belong.

hasAttributes.name: effectiveDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the customer declared active.

hasAttributes.name: expirationDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the customer was declared inactive.

hasAttributes.name: fax
hasAttributes.description: Fax number for the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: firstName
hasAttributes.description: The first (given) name of the person.

hasAttributes.name: lastName
hasAttributes.description: The last (family) name of the person.

hasAttributes.name: legalEntityIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: Third party registration number given by local authorities / local regulators, e.g. company registration number.

hasAttributes.name: name
hasAttributes.description: The name of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: orderAmountLimit
hasAttributes.description: The maximum order limit predefined as per the credit rating of the customer.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDiscountDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days from the invoice date the customer is allowed to take advantage of discounted terms. Terms are represented as digits with no decimal places, e.g. nnn.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDiscountPercentage
hasAttributes.description: The discount percentage the organisation may provide to the customer if an invoice is paid before a certain number of days.

hasAttributes.name: paymentDueDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days allowed to meet the obligation before an invoice becomes overdue.

hasAttributes.name: primaryContactEmail
hasAttributes.description: Email address of the primary contact.

hasAttributes.name: registrationCountry
hasAttributes.description: Supplier country of registration, e.g. USA, UK, India, etc.

hasAttributes.name: registrationNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique number to identify the company in the accounting records, issued by a government authority or created by the company for internal purposes to identify different entities within their corporate group.

hasAttributes.name: registrationPlace
hasAttributes.description: Supplier place of registration, could be district e.g. Houston, Raleigh, Durham, etc.

hasAttributes.name: registrationState
hasAttributes.description: Supplier state of Registration, e.g. Texas, NC, SC, Ontario, etc.

hasAttributes.name: reviewDate
hasAttributes.description: The date when the customer credit risk is reviewed.

hasAttributes.name: secondaryAddress
hasAttributes.description: Secondary address for contact.

hasAttributes.name: secondaryContactPersonEmail
hasAttributes.description: Contact person email address for any communication with the customer.

hasAttributes.name: secondaryContactPersonName
hasAttributes.description: Contact person name for any communication with the customer.

hasAttributes.name: selfBillingIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicator showing if a self-billing agreement exists between the customer and the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: sortCode
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the bank branch at which the account is held. May be needed to uniquely identify the account.

hasAttributes.name: systemApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: systemApprovedUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: systemModifiedUser
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: taxAuthority
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the revenue body to which this taxType refers.

hasAttributes.name: taxNumber
hasAttributes.description: The supplier's tax identification number.

hasAttributes.name: taxRegistrationNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique number issued by a revenue body for use by the company.

hasAttributes.name: taxReportingCodes
hasAttributes.description: Field number that is required for reporting and compliance purpose.

hasAttributes.name: taxType
hasAttributes.description: Tax type for look-up in tables.

hasAttributes.name: taxVerificationDate
hasAttributes.description: The date that the tax registration details referred to above were last checked.

hasAttributes.name: telephone
hasAttributes.description: Phone number of the primary contact at the customer.

hasAttributes.name: termsOfPayment
hasAttributes.description: Terms of payment agreed with the customer, e.g. 30 days from invoice or delivery.

hasAttributes.name: title
hasAttributes.description: The title of the person, e.g. accounting manager.

hasAttributes.name: tolerenceLevel
hasAttributes.description: An allowable amount or percentage of variation over and above the credit limit offered for the customer.

hasAttributes.name: transactionCreditLimit
hasAttributes.description: The per invoice credit limit established with this customer.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: website
hasAttributes.description: URL of supplier website.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of adjustments made, if any, to the receipts against the goods shipped.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentDescription
hasAttributes.description: If an adjustment to the receipt, a description of the reason for the adjustment.

hasAttributes.name: adjustmentIndicator
hasAttributes.description: "0" if the transaction is the original shipment transaction, "1" if the transaction is a shipment adjustment.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: backOrderLine
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify that the item ordered is not in stock and therefore must be back ordered.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: customerAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is expected or to whom unused credits have been applied.

hasAttributes.name: customerid
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: departureDate
hasAttributes.description: The date when shipment will leave the origin location.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the order was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: exportComplianceScreening
hasAttributes.description: An assessment procedure used to determine compliance with export administration regulations.

hasAttributes.name: freightCarrier
hasAttributes.description: The name of the supplier who provides freight for the customer shipment.

hasAttributes.name: goodsShippedAmount
hasAttributes.description: Value of goods shipped in functional currency.

hasAttributes.name: goodsShippedExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: Exchange rate listed on the shipping document relating to the goods shipped.

hasAttributes.name: goodsShippedId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with identifying goods shipped.

hasAttributes.name: intermediateShipToLocation
hasAttributes.description: The delivery point for consolidated shipments, gathered from multiple locations, that will be shipped to an intermediate and/or ultimate ship to location.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: lineAdjustmentAmount
hasAttributes.description: The adjustment amount for the corresponding line item.

hasAttributes.name: lineAdjustmentDescription
hasAttributes.description: The adjustment description for the corresponding line item.

hasAttributes.name: lineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLineAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Order amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLineId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for sales order line number. Must match lineLineNumber used in SalesOrderData. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Sales order line original quantity. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Sales order line base unit of measure. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Sales order line price per unit. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipmentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each line within a shipment. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each shipment.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingDocumentLineId
hasAttributes.description: Reference line number on shipping document.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingLineAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the shipping cost in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingLineAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductBarcode
hasAttributes.description: UPC or other general identifier.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductCode
hasAttributes.description: Product code appearing on the trade document.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductDescription
hasAttributes.description: Product description (plain language) to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the product.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #1, e.g. tyres or accessories.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #2, e.g. brand.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingProductId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each product.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Item quantity sent.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingUnitOfMeasure
hasAttributes.description: Base unit of measure.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Price per unit for item sent.

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL, e.g. "Posted" or "Not Posted".

hasAttributes.name: releaseSaleOrderRules
hasAttributes.description: The criteria for release of order line details depending on the warehouse, shipment request date, and item on the basis of priorities defined.

hasAttributes.name: releaseSequenceRules
hasAttributes.description: Defines the rules to meet the shipment priorities.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Order amount in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of sales order for items shipped. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. Currency Amount x Exchange Rate = Amount.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderId
hasAttributes.description: Sales order ID for invoiced items. Must match OrderNo in SalesOrderData. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: scheduleDate
hasAttributes.description: The shipment date set forth in seller’s acknowledgment for an accepted Purchase Order.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: shipmentDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of shipment.

hasAttributes.name: shipmentFiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the ShipmentDate occurs

hasAttributes.name: shipmentId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each shipment. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (e.g. document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each shipment.

hasAttributes.name: shipmentIdLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Line ID or number of the document (e.g. shipping document) associated with the shipping.

hasAttributes.name: shipmentPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the ShipmentDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: shippingAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the shipping in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: shippingAmountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: shippingDocumentId
hasAttributes.description: Reference number on shipping document (company reference or logistics company identifier).

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: volumeUOMClass
hasAttributes.description: Defining the volume UOM for customer order shipment.

hasAttributes.name: weightUOMClass
hasAttributes.description: Defining the weight UOM for customer order shipment.
